description: Add cr as a short alias symlink for common-repo

tasks.name: Update install.sh to create cr symlink
steps: Check if cr already exists in install directory
If cr exists and is not our symlink, skip with warning
Handle Windows case (may need .cmd wrapper or skip)
acceptance_criteria: Install script creates cr symlink by default
Existing cr files are not overwritten
Warning shown when skipping due to existing file

tasks.name: Update GitHub release workflow for cr symlink
steps: Check if release archives can include symlinks
If yes, add cr symlink to release archives
If no, document that cr is created by install script only
Update release notes template to mention cr alias
acceptance_criteria: Release process handles cr alias appropriately
Documentation reflects how cr is installed

tasks.name: Document cr alias in README and docs
steps: Add note about cr alias to README installation section
Show examples using both common-repo and cr
acceptance_criteria: Installation docs explain how to skip alias

tasks.name: Add tests for symlink creation
steps: Add shell script test for install.sh symlink behavior
acceptance_criteria: Install script symlink behavior is tested

notes: The existing 'cr' command (for newline conversion) is obscure and rarely installed
Symlink approach avoids building two binaries
Windows may require special handling (symlinks are restricted)
